score.title: Paranoia, on the streets of London
paragraphs: "Let me take you by the hand and lead you through the streets of London. I’ll show you something that’ll make you change your mind..."

We hear things every day, in the news, on the internet. Theories, ideas, bizarre yet not entirely impossible to disregard. Perhaps the Russians have been engineering a bio-gentic virus in their labs. Perhaps the terrorist bombing campaign was nothing but a hoax orchestrated by the government to justify joining a unjustifiable war. Perhaps the royal family are really lizards.

For every person who actively chasing after conspiracies there are those who are drawn in unaware. But who’s the more dangerous... the one who believes the theories, or those determined to silence them.

This playset deals with everyday people who get wrapped up in conspiracy theories (and is set in and around London, seat of the government, home to the royal family, and magnet for all sorts of weirdness).
